name: create_dossier
description: Creation of the dossier for a participant.

dossier_id.description: Identifier of the dossier within the Tenant. This will be used as the dossier_id in the situation.

person_id.description: Identifier of the participant person. This will be used as the person_id in the situation.

birth_date.description: The date of birth of the participant.
